speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Is our whole dissembly appeared?

speaker: VERGES
text: O, a stool and a cushion for the Sexton.

speaker: SEXTON
text: Which be the malefactors?

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Marry, that am I, and my partner.

speaker: VERGES
text: Nay, that’s certain, we have the exhibition to

speaker: VERGES
text: examine.

speaker: SEXTON
text: But which are the offenders that are to be

speaker: SEXTON
text: examined? Let them come before Master

speaker: SEXTON
text: Constable.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Yea, marry, let them come before me.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: What is your name, friend?

speaker: BORACHIO
text: Borachio.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Pray, write down “Borachio.”—Yours,

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: sirrah?

speaker: CONRADE
text: I am a gentleman, sir, and my name is

speaker: CONRADE
text: Conrade.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Write down “Master Gentleman Conrade.”—

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Masters, do you serve God?

speaker:
BORACHIO
              /
              CONRADE
text: Yea, sir, we hope.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Write down that they hope they serve

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: God; and write God first, for God defend but God

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: should go before such villains!—Masters, it is

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: proved already that you are little better than false

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: knaves, and it will go near to be thought so shortly.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: How answer you for yourselves?

speaker: CONRADE
text: Marry, sir, we say we are none.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: A marvelous witty fellow, I assure you,

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: but I will go about with him.—Come you hither,

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: sirrah, a word in your ear. Sir, I say to you it is

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: thought you are false knaves.

speaker: BORACHIO
text: Sir, I say to you we are none.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Well, stand aside.—’Fore God, they are

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: both in a tale. Have you writ down that they are

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: none?

speaker: SEXTON
text: Master constable, you go not the way to

speaker: SEXTON
text: examine. You must call forth the watch that are

speaker: SEXTON
text: their accusers.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Yea, marry, that’s the eftest way.—Let

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: the watch come forth. Masters, I charge you in the

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Prince’s name, accuse these men.

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WATCHMAN
text: This man said, sir, that Don John, the

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WATCHMAN
text: Prince’s brother, was a villain.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Write down Prince John a villain. Why,

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: this is flat perjury, to call a prince’s brother villain!

speaker: BORACHIO
text: Master constable—

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Pray thee, fellow, peace. I do not like thy

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: look, I promise thee.

speaker: SEXTON
text: What heard you him say else?

speaker: SEACOAL
text: Marry, that he had received a thousand

speaker: SEACOAL
text: ducats of Don John for accusing the Lady Hero

speaker: SEACOAL
text: wrongfully.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Flat burglary as ever was committed.

speaker: VERGES
text: Yea, by Mass, that it is.

speaker: SEXTON
text: What else, fellow?

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WATCHMAN
text: And that Count Claudio did mean,

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WATCHMAN
text: upon his words, to disgrace Hero before the whole

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WATCHMAN
text: assembly, and not marry her.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: O, villain! Thou wilt be condemned

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: into everlasting redemption for this!

speaker: SEXTON
text: What else?

speaker: SEACOAL
text: This is all.

speaker: SEXTON
text: And this is more, masters, than you can deny.

speaker: SEXTON
text: Prince John is this morning secretly stolen away.

speaker: SEXTON
text: Hero was in this manner accused, in this very

speaker: SEXTON
text: manner refused, and upon the grief of this suddenly

speaker: SEXTON
text: died.—Master constable, let these men be bound

speaker: SEXTON
text: and brought to Leonato’s. I will go before and show

speaker: SEXTON
text: him their examination.

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Come, let them be opinioned.

speaker: VERGES
text: Let them be in the hands—

speaker: CONRADE
text: Off, coxcomb!

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: God’s my life, where’s the Sexton? Let

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: him write down the Prince’s officer “coxcomb.”

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Come, bind them.—Thou naughty varlet!

speaker: CONRADE
text: Away! You are an ass, you are an ass!

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Dost thou not suspect my place? Dost

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: thou not suspect my years? O, that he were here to

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: write me down an ass! But masters, remember that

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: I am an ass, though it be not written down, yet

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: forget not that I am an ass.—No, thou villain, thou

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: art full of piety, as shall be proved upon thee by

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: good witness. I am a wise fellow and, which is more,

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: an officer and, which is more, a householder and,

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: which is more, as pretty a piece of flesh as any is in

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: Messina, and one that knows the law, go to, and a

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: rich fellow enough, go to, and a fellow that hath had

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: losses, and one that hath two gowns and everything

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: handsome about him.—Bring him away.—O, that I

speaker: DOGBERRY
text: had been writ down an ass!
